page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: FARMING The farmland in the area is mainly arable, but there is also some grazing land. There is also some mixed woodland. Some of the farms are owned by the farmer, some are rented and some land is farmed by people living out of the area. The type of farms include mixed farming,fat-stock,cross-breeds, sheep and dairy farms. In the squares, grid reference 426271 and 427271, the land was farm- land. In the area there were three farms,{Grounds Farm,Oaks Farm,and {Castle Farm.}These farms were once part of the{Clarendon Estate}which included{Kenilworth Castle.}The farms were sold in the 1930's and in most cases are still in the ownership of the original purchasers.
